content: Are there any demo service implementations available that use FHIR 3.0 resources? I am starting to prototype client app invocation of cds-hooks and all of my work is based on FHIR 3.0. The demo references I've found on cds-hooks.org appear to be all DSTU-2. Thanks!
Yeah, the FHIR sandbox that is wired to demo.cds-hooks.org is currently DSTU 2. We're going to enhance the sandbox to allow you to hook up any FHIR server (see #19) which will address your need here.

Something that is worth noting too on this topic is that no EHR that I'm aware of has STU3 deployed. Given that STU3 was just released a couple months ago, my guess is that it will be some time before we start seeing STU3 deployments in production.

Thanks Kevin. I understand that most production servers are stuck on DSTU2 for now, but thought there may be some prototype STU3 CDS services created for connectathons, etc. This may be a good opportunity for the HSPC Sandbox to host and demonstrate cds-hooks for STU3, I'll pursue that approach for now.
Yeah, hooking up to the HSPC FHIR Sandbox (or any other FHIR Sandbox) would be great

As it turns out, I learned about a hidden feature of the CDS Hooks Sandbox where if you add a fhirServiceUrl URL parameter, you can point to any FHIR server. So, you could do this today to hit a STU3 sandbox
Note: I haven't tested this myself yet :)
